pages.text: The spirit wood staff itself does not carry any spells, can release magick directly without charging, and a Molding Spell can be equipped. You can craft a spirit wood staff by combining a Molding Spell and a spirit wood staff at a workbench. A spirit wood staff with a Molding Spell can be used as a crafting ingredient to extract the Molding Spell.
Crafted at the Magick Synthesis Matrix
